about_the_game:
The DLC contains 51 wallpapers, all the priestesses of love and the goddess Luxuria, which you unlock as you progress through the game Hero of Luxuria.

As a bonus, +1 art with Avaritia has been added.

All 51 artworks:

- contain Nude and NSFW;
- in High Quality;
- have a resolution of 3840 x 2160 pixels in PNG format;
- are suitable for monitors with 4K resolution and higher.

Wallpapers DLC contains only static PNG images.

content_descriptors.notes: Wallpaper contains sexual content, nudity and BDSM. The wallpaper contains images of nude mythical creatures such as fairy, centaur, naga, etc.
